name: Edge Run
description:
You have to go through an exciting journey in a world about which you know nothing. You have to show your dexterity skills to overcome physical obstacles, as well as the power of your mind to solve tricky puzzles. With each new stage, new opportunities will await you.
After all, each new stage will throw you new challenges that you must overcome in order to become the best. But who is the best? Why does the whole environment look like a computer simulation? Who came up with these tests, and most importantly, why? This is for you to find out. We wish you exciting adventures!

What is waiting for you?

Exciting puzzles will be waiting for you, which will become more and more difficult with each new level. In addition, we tried to integrate new mechanics or gameplay features into each new level. Well, the most important thing is that you will have to show unprecedented dexterity and reaction! Parkour is integrated into all levels. Its difficulty is non-linear and can vary from level to level or even within one small part. We also really hope for your attentiveness and curiosity, and we sincerely hope that you will be able to discover all the secrets of this world!
